Package Controller.Phases

Class PlayGamePhase

java.lang.Object
Controller.Phases.Phase
Controller.Phases.PlayGamePhase
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlayMainPhase, PlaySetupPhase
public abstract class PlayGamePhase
extends Phase
Represents a phase during game play. This abstract class extends the Phase class and provides a base for game play phases. In this phase, common methods such as showing the game map and editing map elements are implemented to handle the common behavior in game play phases.
